pullRequest.title: Roles in user details
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Display Roles on the Users Details Page
Motivation and Context
The user wants to see the roles a user has.

nodes.bodyText: Whats ist the purpose of hl here? I saw a warning in the console, that hl is not a supported html tag.
We could create a constant for the initial page size and use it here + for the PaginatedList -> pagesSizes

There are some warnings in the console for these methods:
.then() only accepts functions but was passed: [object Undefined]
We could display a message here, if there are no results for the current search.
I like it! but we should display the spinner, like in the UsersOverview currently Loading... is being displayed under the headline.
I prefer to trigger the user notification inside the component, so the store does not contain any presentation logic.  We should refactor this for our previous changes as well.

commit.message: Refine display of Roles for user
Create PaginatedItemOverview to make it reusable
